withdraw.label: Withdraw all or part of my claim

postpone.label: Ask the tribunal to postpone my hearing

vary.label: Vary an order the tribunal has issued

reconsider_decision.label: Apply to have a decision made by a legal officer considered afresh

respondent.label: Order the respondent to do something

witness.label: Order a witness to attend to give evidence

noncompliance.label: Tell the tribunal a respondent has not complied with an order

strike.label: Strike out all or part of the response

reconsider_judgement.label: Apply for a judgment to be reconsidered

other.label: Contact the tribunal about something else
